example:
() => (
  <Stack spacing="loose">
    <Stack spacing="condensed">
      <Text>How much do you like Orbit?</Text>
      <Stack direction="row">
        <Button type="primarySubtle" circled>
          1
        </Button>
        <Button type="primarySubtle" circled>
          2
        </Button>
        <Button type="primarySubtle" circled>
          3
        </Button>
      </Stack>
    </Stack>
    <Button iconLeft={<Icons.Edit />} circled title="Edit this page" />
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Circled button
info.description: Circled buttons should be used only with a single number or icon. If using only an icon, remember to include a title.
